Articles.Content:
I had my Icarus space plane sitting at the end of the runway getting ready to launch, when I see an explosion over near the VAB!  I get a Keral in a rover and drive over there and, sure enough, there is debris!

 

Anyone else see this?  Anyone know the cause?  The space center view doesn't list anything as needing repair.

 

See pictures.

Might be a bug. Is the KSC usable? If it is, then the KSC probably only took partial damage.

Edited February 15, 2016 by Clockwork13

No clue what may have caused it, but if you find it unsightly you can probably mash the other fuel tank on the VAB's lot and repair it. Probably the least expensive approach. If I had the funds to spare I'd probably just mow down the entire VAB lot for giggles.

 

Totally unrelated to the issue at hand, but do you ever plan to clear that notification thingy? I mean, yeah there's no real point in checking the darned thing but holy moly.

I guess it does need to be repaired.  

I'm still at a mystery and what cased it.  The only thing I can think of is some piece of desbris, but what are the odds?

Yeah. Your notifications number is bothering my OCD, too.

What's your address so I can come over and clear that out?
